sections.heading: What This Means for You
sections.content: AI Engagement Hub takes your privacy seriously. This guide explains how we protect your data and what you can expect.

subsections.heading: Your Privacy Rights

private.description: Only you and your instructor can see them
Other students cannot access your work
PDFs and files you upload are protected

instructorCanSee: Your AI chat history (to help guide your learning)

tips.description: Your AI conversations are private from other students
Don't worry about looking silly, only your instructor sees
Experiment with AI without peer judgment
Your work is protected and timestamped

subsections.heading: What You Can Access
privacyBoundaries: Cannot see students from other courses
Cannot access other instructors' course data
Cannot view student data after they leave your course

practices.description: Let them know you can see their AI usage
Use visibility to help, not penalize

subsections.heading: The Technology Behind It
subsections.content: We use Firebase Security Rules - think of it as a smart filter that automatically shows each person only the data they're allowed to see:

flows: Student A logs in → Sees only Student A's data
Instructor logs in → Sees only their course students' data
Student B logs in → Sees only Student B's data

subsections.security: This happens automatically at the database level, making it nearly impossible to accidentally expose private data.

details: Students work on separate AI conversations
Each student sees only their own work
Student Assistants can view (not edit) peer work
Clear audit trail of who viewed what

questions.question: Can my classmates see my AI chats?
questions.answer: No, your AI conversations are private. Only you and your instructor can see them.

questions.question: What if I make a mistake or ask a "dumb" question?
questions.answer: Your questions are private from peers. Your instructor sees them to help guide your learning, not to judge.

questions.question: Can I delete my data?
questions.answer: Yes, you can delete your own projects and conversations. Contact your instructor for help with permanent deletion.

questions.question: Can I share examples of good student work?
questions.answer: Only with explicit student permission. Consider anonymizing examples or asking students to volunteer work for sharing.

questions.question: How long can I access student data?
questions.answer: As long as the student is enrolled in your course. After course completion, access may be restricted based on institutional policy.

questions.question: Can I export student data?
questions.answer: Yes, for legitimate educational purposes like grading or assessment. Always follow your institution's data handling policies.

questions.question: Is my child's data safe?
questions.answer: Yes, we implement multiple layers of security including encryption, access controls, and audit logging.

questions.question: Who can see my child's work?
questions.answer: Only your child and their instructor. Other students cannot access your child's work or AI conversations.

questions.question: What happens to data after the course ends?
questions.answer: Data is retained according to your institution's policy. Students can request their data or deletion at any time.

contacts.action: Reach out to the school's privacy officer

items: Know your instructor can see AI chats (for help!)
Feel free to explore and learn
Ask if you have privacy questions

footer.reminder: Privacy enables better learning. When students know their data is protected, they're more likely to engage authentically with AI tools and develop real skills.
